description:
The app is now on sale!!

Enjoy thousands of jokes (no internet connection required), with more added every week, for free. You have them all organized into categories, and you can come back anytime and see the ones you've already read. If you finish them, you can anytime switch to the online side of the app, and see hundreds of jokes added every week.         The categories in the app cover a wide range, from the classic Beer and Blonde jokes, to games and doctor jokes.         Please, if you have any suggestions, use the contact in the application menu. The application is updated once every month, with new new features and jokes.
